Order.label: Autoregressive order of the VAR model

Intercept.label: True if the model includes an intercept (constant) term

EstimationSpan.label: Date range for estimation, not including initial conditions

IdentificationHorizon.label: Number of periods for shock responses

ReducibleNames.label: Names of reducible variables included in the PCA decomposition

ReducibleBlocks.label: Names of model blocks to which the reducible variables belong

BlockType.label: Specification of the block structure: either 'blocks' or 'slowfast'

NumFactors.label: Number of latent factors extracted for each specified block
